data.actual_result: It starts moving to and fro from it's initial to final position.
data.short_description: When you unselect "Automatically determine input sensitivity" and move the circular button kind of thing in the bar and stop it, the circular thing flickers.
data.steps_to_repro: - Open settings> Voice and Video. - Unselect "Automatically determine input sensitivity". - Move the circular thingy to any side. - Keeping your finger still on the circular thing, stop your finger i.e. move the circular thing no more. - Observe the circular thing.
